pub.devrel.easygoogle.gac

Class AppInvites

  • java.lang.Object
    • pub.devrel.easygoogle.gac.GacModule
      • pub.devrel.easygoogle.gac.AppInvites

  • public class AppInvites
extends GacModule
    Interface to the App Invites API, which can be used to send Email and/or SMS invitations to a user's contacts. For more information visit: https://developers.google.com/app-invites/

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  AppInvites.AppInviteListener
      Listener to be notified of asynchronous App Invite events, like invitation receipt or sending success.

    • Method Detail

      • sendInvitation

        public void sendInvitation(java.lang.String title,
                  java.lang.String message,
                  Uri deeplink)
        Launch the UI where the user can choose contacts and send invitations. The UI will be populated with the arguments of this method, however the user can choose to change the final invitation message. Success or failure of this call will be reported to AppInvites.AppInviteListener.
        Parameters:
        title - the title to display at the top of the invitation window. Cannot be overridden by the user.
        message - the message to suggest as the body of the invitation, this will be editable by the sending user.
        deeplink - a URI containing any information the receiving party will need to make use of the invitation, such as a coupon code or another identifier.
